segments.text: I didn't mean to . It was an accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have completely damaged my car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did not . It looks perfectly fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't see what happened to my bumper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did I do to it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You smashed my bumper in with your car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't think that I did that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your bumper looks exactly the same .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , just give me your insurance and number and I'll take care of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me your information , in case I don't hear from you .
segments.speaker: S1
